overview: A sensitive, educated black man's World War II-time problems. This is essentially the duplicate of his peace-time problems which are pointed up in a flashback of his life, and primarily of his war-time adventures with four white soldiers on a dangerous reconnaissance mission on a Japanese-held island.
tagline: Excitement - Movie of the Year! Suspense! Action! Adventure! You have never seen a motion picture like it!
title: Home of the Brave
